title: Longest palindrome with no adjacent duplicates
text:
We are given a string. Determine the longest palindromic substring without any adjacent duplicates.For example: S="ABBCBBA", longest palindromic substring is "ABBCBBBA" but it contains adjacent duplicates, so the required string is "BCB".EDIT: If there are multiple such strings then print the lexicographical  smallest string.InputThe first line of input contains a t, the number of test cases and the following line of each test case a string S (1 ≤ S ≤ 5000)OutputPrint the required string.ExampleInput:1
MBBCDCBBMOutput:BCDCBNOTE : String will be in uppercase only.
